@nycsouthpaw @guan Yeah, I'm looking forward to the first IPO that doesn't come with votes or dividends or anything of value.

@guan I mean, what's the chance that $22B is anywhere close to an accurate estimate of the NPV of future DELL dividends?
@guan @nycsouthpaw But my point is people don't buy stock for the votes or the dividends, they buy it to sell it to someone else.
@nycsouthpaw Do you think most shareholders are buying stock so they can vote? Turnout rates are awfully low.
